Class Scope

    Representation of a scope.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Scope

        public Scope​(Scope parentScope)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        parentScope - The enclosing scope or null if there is none.

    • Method Detail

      • addIdentifier

        public void addIdentifier​(java.lang.String name,
                          Declaration declaration)
        Add an identifier to this scope. Throws an OverwritingDeclarationError if the identifier has been declared before in this scope.
        Parameters:
        name - The identifier name.
        declaration - The declaration side of the identifier.

      • getDeclaration

        public Declaration getDeclaration​(java.lang.String name)
        Get the closest declaration site of an identifier declared in this scope or any of the enclosing scopes. Throws an UndeclaredReferenceError if the identifier has not been declared before.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the referenced identifier.
        Returns:
        The closest declaration site of the referenced identifier.

      • getParentScope

        public Scope getParentScope()
        Get the directly enclosing scope of this scope.
        Returns:
        The directly enclosing scope or null if there is none.
